argument.name: Table_List
argument.description: A character string containing information about open tables.

page.discussion: The TABLE.ENUM_OPEN() method returns a character string containing information about open tables.

section.description: The following script returns a list of open tables.
section.example: ? table.enum_open("F"+crlf()) = C:\PROGRAM FILES\A5V6\A_CASE.DBF C:\PROGRAM FILES\A5V6\A_GLOSS.DBF C:\PROGRAM FILES\A5V6\NULL.DBF C:\PROGRAM FILES\A5V6\NULL.DBF C:\DATABASES\ALPHASPORTS\CUSTOMER.DBF

section.description: The following script closes one of the tables in this list.
section.example: dim tbl as P tbl = table. get("C:\DATABASES\ALPHASPORTS\CUSTOMER.DBF") tbl.close()
